SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.utils.matrix

Class MatrixSubMatrixIterator<T>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.utils.matrix.MatrixSubMatrixIterator<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the elements in the matrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator<Matrix<T>>
public class MatrixSubMatrixIterator<T> extends Object implements Iterator<Matrix<T>>
An iterator for the submatrices of a matrix. The submatrices are of a fixed size, and are overlapping. The iterator can be configured to iterate over the partially out-of-bounds submatrices as well.
Author:
Roberto Alessandro Bertolini

  • Constructor Details

    • MatrixSubMatrixIterator

      public MatrixSubMatrixIterator(Matrix<T> matrix, int subMatrixSizeX, int subMatrixSizeY, boolean iterateOutOfBounds)
      Create a new iterator for the given matrix, with the given submatrix size.
      Parameters:
      matrix - the matrix to iterate over
      subMatrixSizeX - the width of the submatrices
      subMatrixSizeY - the height of the submatrices
      iterateOutOfBounds - whether to iterate over the partially out-of-bounds submatrices as well

  • Method Details

    • remove

      public void remove(Matrix<T> mask)
      Given a matrix mask, removes the elements of the matrix that correspond to the non-empty elements of the mask.
      Parameters:
      mask - a matrix of the same size as the submatrix that contains the elements to remove
